Chris Huhne , Energy and Climate Change Secretary, said: Offshore wind not only provides clean, Grant Shapps , secure energy, the investment that comes with it is great for the UK economy too.`` A new wind farm off the Humberside coast will be a further jobs and investment boost for the region, hot on the heels of Siemens' announcement of plans to develop the Port of Hull.
